attributes.action: Instigate a vote of No-Confidence in the Prime Minister post the Gray Report.
attributes.additional_details: His appalling and demeaning behaviour over Partygate is something that is not acceptable in the high office of PM - he needs to resign or be removed by the Tory party forthwith
attributes.background: Have a free vote (no whips) on whether Parliament has confidence in the PM continuing to lead the country after the Gray Report was published

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
